column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Chastity - Thanks for you review. I'm sorry you found our ramen underwhelming. We're never going to be all things to all people
column2: but we are still grateful you gave us a try
column3: regardless. As far as your server having gone missing for 20 minutes -- that is unacceptable
column4: and I would like your help in identifying your server so that I might have a word with him/her about it. Can you provide me more details in a private message? My only assumption is that sometimes servers choose not to interrupt customers if they're in deep conversation
column5: or if the house isn't very busy and the customers appear to be "hanging out
column6: as it were. But if neither of those scenarios was the case, like I said, I'd like to speak to the server to make sure it doesn't happen again. Thanks again.
